articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Irish President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Irish President
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Mary Mcaleese, President of Ireland, on the occasion of the national day of the country.
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries will develop favorably in different fields, the message wished the Irish President success in the work for settling the economic problem.

articles.title: DPRK Delegates Meet Cambodian Parliamentary Groups
articles.content:
DPRK Delegates Meet Cambodian Parliamentary Group
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Talks between delegations of the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Parliamentary Group and the Cambodia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation headed by Song Ja Rip, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly and chairman of the group, and from the Cambodian side were members of the delegation led by Som Chen, member of the National Assembly and chairman of the group.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the matter of further developing the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parliaments and exchanged views on a series of matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Agreement Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Agreement Marked
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club Tuesday to mark the 61st anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Russian Artists Interviewed
articles.content:
Russian Artists Interviewed
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Members of the delegation of Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory of Russia on a visit to the DPRK appreciated opera "Evgeni Onegin" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday before being interviewed by KCNA.
					 They said they were very much impressed to watch the performance which clearly showcased Juche-oriented art efflorescing and developing under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 President Alexandr Sokolov, head of the delegation, said that the opera is a work closely associated with his conservatory, adding that words fail to properly give his impression of the opera re-represented by Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory.
					
					 He stressed that the opera could be successfully re-produced thanks to the meticulous guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He evinced his resolution to boost exchange and cooperation between the two conservatories in the future so as to contribute to the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 Dean of the Faculty of Vocal Music Pyotr Skusnichenko, a member of the delegation, said that watching the performance he felt that the conservatory in Pyongyang had a high level of education and the artistic talent of its students was also high.
					
					 Dean of the Faculty of Directors Stanislav Kalinin, a member of the delegation, noted that the level of musicians of the conservatory orchestra was fairly high as it is difficult to play the music pieces contained in the Russian opera, adding that the performance convinced him of a rosy future of the Korean music.

articles.title: Spring Sowing of Wheat and Barley Seeds Finished
articles.content:
Spring Sowing of Wheat and Barley Seeds Finished
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Spring sowing of wheat and barley seeds has been wound up on the farms in different parts of the DPRK.
					 Officials and working people in the agricultural field in South Hwanghae Province sowed wheat and barley seeds in over 300 more hectares than planned.
					
					 Farms in North Phyongan Province and on the outskirts of Pyongyang finished the sowing earlier than scheduled while those in North Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces and Nampho City completed the sowing in right season.
					
					 Having finished the sowing, the agricultural workers are now busy making thorough preparations for immediate farming.

articles.title: New Scientific Films Produced
articles.content:
New Scientific Films Produced
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio has recently produced new scientific films giving scientific and technical information and common knowledge about the greening of cities. 
					 "Soilless Cultivation of Turf in Humus-cakes" offers an explicit explanation of the new turf cultivation method and its advantages.
					
					 By this method, it is possible to cultivate turf two or three times a year and raise the productivity three or four times higher than the existing methods.
					
					 "Let's Plant Many Large Tara Vines" gives a scientific and technical solution to problems arising in extensively propagating large tara vine or Actinidia chinensis useful in different aspects. 
					
					 The films are helpful toward garbing streets and villages in green in spring.

articles.title: All Korean Determined to Punish Aggressors
articles.content:
All Korean Determined to Punish Aggressors 
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers now being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are down-the-line aggressive exercises and test nuclear war aimed at launching a surprise preemptive attack on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					  With a grave situation prevailing in the country due to the adventurous saber-rattling, all the servicepersons and people of Korea are now determined to mete out a merciless punishment to the aggressors.
					
					 Servicepersons on frontline, coastal and air guard duty are keeping a close eye on every move of the enemy seeking a preemptive attack while the units of three services are on the alert, waiting for an order to go into action.
					
					  All the militia, including the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards, are ready to annihilate the enemy if they invade the ground, seas and sky of the DPRK even an inch.
					
					 Kim Won Ho, a student of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that the heroic spirit of defending the country, displayed by student-turned soldiers in the past Fatherland Liberation War, has been inherited by the university students in the Songun era.
					
					 "If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers bring a cloud of nuclear war over this land in disregard of our repeated warnings, we will devote ourselves to defending the country as the students of the previous generation did," he added.
					
					 Meanwhile, all the Korean people are now pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation with a rifle in one hand and a hammer and sickle in the other.

articles.title: Hero's Lofty Spirit Inherited by Youth
articles.content:
Hero's Lofty Spirit Inherited by Youth
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The youth and students of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are resolved to wipe out the aggressors and achieve national reunification, a long-cherished desire of the Korean nation, should the U.S. imperialists and warmongers of south Korea invade the ground, seas and sky of the country even an inch.
					 When visiting Ri Su Bok Sunchon University of Chemical Engineering, Pak Song Il, a student of Munhwa Secondary School in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province told KCNA the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers had turned the whole of south Korea into a powder-reeking theatre of war exercises and led the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war and that if the enemy started a war against the DPRK he would defend the country at the cost of his life as hero Ri Su Bok did in the past war.
					
					 The university, precursor of Sunchon Higher Middle School that is alma mater of the hero, has been visited by a large number of youth and students to learn from the lofty spirit of the young hero, who devoted himself to the fatherland without hesitation.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War Ri Su Bok, 18, blocked the enemy's pillbox with his body to open the way to a charge for his unit in the Height 1,211 battle and died a heroic death.
					
					 On display in the Hero Hall of the university are several pieces of remains offering glimpses of his childhood and school days, a relief map of Height 1,211 and an oil painting portraying him rushing towards the enemy's pillbox.
					
					 Also seen in the hall is the famous poem he composed just before the battle.
					
					 The higher middle school was named after him in November Juche 44 (1955) and his statue erected on the campus in October 1957.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Accountable for Derailing Process for Denuclearization
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Accountable for Derailing Process for Denuclearization 
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to ignite a nuclear war have again torpedoed the process for peace and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.  The Korean Central News Agency released a memorandum on Tuesday denouncing the U.S. for posing a threat of a nuclear war to the DPRK and pursuing a hostile policy toward it and the south Korean authorities for following a reckless policy, pursuant to it.
					 The memorandum says:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces mean a total denial of the process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula as they are a test nuclear war of aggression against the DPRK aimed at posing the biggest nuclear threat to it.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities assert that the exercises do not pose any problem as they are "annual ones" and "defensive ones" being not of offensive nature. This is as ridiculous as claiming that even robbery becomes just if it is committed every year.
					
					 This saber-rattling is the latest version of Team Spirit recorded in history as a test nuclear war for provoking the second Korean war.
					
					 With nothing can the warmongers deny the aggressive nature of the above-said war maneuvers as a test nuclear war aimed at preempting a strike at the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite illogical for the DPRK to sit at the negotiating table with hostile forces to discuss the issue of dismantling the self-defensive nuclear deterrent as they are brandishing a nuclear sword to mount a surprise attack on it, while paying lip-service to dialogue.
					
					 The test nuclear war for posing a serious nuclear threat to the DPRK is an extension of the U.S. invariable policy to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Looking back on history, the U.S. has only pursued a policy to bring down the system in the DPRK, not seeking any solution to the issue based on the respect for sovereignty, as far as its relations with the DPRK are concerned. 
					
					 The U.S. foolish policy to put into practice the policy to stifle the DPRK behind the scene of denuclearization got more undisguised during the Bush administration.
					
					 The U.S. whipped up an atmosphere of international sanctions while describing the launch of Kwangmyongsong-2 as a missile launch. This convinced the DPRK that the present administration does not want to see things going well in the DPRK and it is little different from the preceding administration in pursuing the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					  The U.S. maximized the nuclear threat to the DPRK by kicking off such test nuclear war as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises and is going in the direction of tightening the economic sanctions against the latter, taking issue with the activities of the Korea Taepung International Investment Group and the State Development Bank. 
					
					 The process for denuclearization cannot make any progress unless the U.S. gives up its sinister intention to bring down the system in the DPRK and stifle its cause, wasting time behind the curtain of denuclearization. 
					
					 The process for denuclearizing the peninsula has been put at a stalemate entirely because of reckless sycophancy of the south Korean authorities toward the U.S. and their moves to escalate the confrontation of systems as they have created confusion and hurdles in the way of solving the nuclear issue, asserting that "the north should dismantle its nukes first" as a servant executing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Even after the DPRK took a series of positive and bold measures to improve the inter-Korean relations recently, the puppet authorities put the above-said assertion as a precondition for warming the inter-Korean relations, scuttling the efforts to settle the nuclear issue between the DPRK and the U.S. and escalating the confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The group of traitors declared "liberal democracy" as "a principle and orientation for unification" right after their seizure of power. They are cooperating with the U.S. in the efforts to realize their scenario to bring down the system in the DPRK and achieve "unification of systems," while asserting that the north should dismantle its nukes first, pursuant to that "principle."   
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can never improve and there can be no environment for solving the nuclear issue on the peninsula as long as the south Korean authorities go mad with standing in the way of the process for denuclearization and kicking up a treacherous nuclear war racket, blinded with the wild ambition to achieve "unification of systems," a sheer delusion. 
					
					 No settlement of the issue on the peninsula can be expected unless the most fundamental issue, ie a war or peace, is solved. 
					
					 The U.S. should take substantial steps to put an end to the state of war, hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S., a military and political root cause of the nuclear issue and the nuclear threat, and build confidence between them.

articles.title: US Invariable Scenario for Preemptive Nuclear Attack Blasted
articles.content:
US Invariable Scenario for Preemptive Nuclear Attack Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- It has been recently disclosed that the United States worked out an operation plan in which the DPRK, China, Russia, Iran and other countries are designated as potential targets of its preemptive nuclear attacks and is contemplating developing new type offensive weapons.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 This reveals once again the double-dealing tactics and nuclear ambition of the U.S. whose words do not match its deeds, having an axe to grind. 
					
					 The U.S. "smile as a token of good faith" is nothing but a gesture for propaganda's purpose to pull the wool over the eyes of world people, political window-dressing and a chicanery to mentally disarm the anti-U.S. countries.
					
					 The U.S. is now loud-mouthed about "a world without nuclear weapons" and "regional denuclearization" but, in actuality, has secretly worked to round off new operation plans to mount preemptive nuclear attacks on those countries regarded as hostile to it since long ago. 
					
					 The basic aim sought by the U.S. imperialists in developing weapons capable of swiftly striking any part of the earth under the pretext of someone's "missile threat" is to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK and other countries lying in the way of realizing their ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. has put spurs to the development of new type weapons after singling out the DPRK as a target of its preemptive nuclear attack. This fact once again convinces the DPRK that the U.S. hostile policy toward it and Washington's scenario for preemptive nuclear attack remain unchanged.
					
					 The action taken by the U.S. can never go with the process for solving the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK was entirely just when it opted for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the U.S. increasing nuclear threat and its evermore undisguised attempt to attack the DPRK. The DPRK's war deterrent will steadily grow strong as long as the U.S. persistently follows its hostile policy toward the DPRK and escalates the moves for a preemptive nuclear attack on it.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Treacherous Aim under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Treacherous Aim under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The issue of resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang and Kaesong area remains unsettled due to the unreasonable attitude and stand of the south Korean conservative authorities, observes Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's proposal for resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang is aimed to meet the wishes of the south Korean people to see the famous mountain of the nation and to promote national reconciliation and cooperation and mend the strained north-south relations through that undertaking.
					
					 But, the south Korean authorities' approach is quite contrary to it.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities are dead-set against the resumption of the above-said tour in a bid to bar it from leading to the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and tighten the U.S.-led "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The group of Hyon In Thaek were vociferous that if the tour of Mt. Kumgang and Kaesong area is resumed, "they will prevent the money paid to the north from being diverted to the purpose of nuclear development" and "they are examining a proposal for making payment for tour not in cash but in kind." This balderdash was a revelation of their sinister intention to tighten the "sanctions" against the DPRK under the pretext of "transparency" in an effort to deliberately throw a hurdle in the way of resuming the tour.
					
					 The DPRK clarified its stand that it would be compelled to take a resolute measure if the south Korean authorities persistently block the resumption of the above-said tour under the far-fetched pretexts. Should the south Korean authorities continue to refuse the resumption of the tour, defying the DPRK's warning, they will be wholly accountable for the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Free Rein to National Self-respect Called for
articles.content:
Free Rein to National Self-respect Called for
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are strong in their national self-respect and they have created a heroic epic of great surge by fully displaying their mental power based on national self-respect.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The national self-respect serves as an immensely powerful mental engine in the on-going drive to adorn the triumphant campaign for a great surge with even greater victory.
					
					 It is the self-respect and pluck of the Korean people to make everything impeccable to be commensurate with a thriving nation whether they produce any light-industrial goods or build an apartment house.
					
					 They are determined to advance by leaps and bounds at a single step while others have to take a thousand steps. This national self-respect serves as an engine for creating a new speed of advance for a great surge while working miracles and performing feats every minute and second. 
					
					 It is the enthusiasm based on national self-respect for the Korean people to always dynamically dash ahead to attain higher goals, looking at the world. 
					
					 Rapid progress is being made in the efforts to put production processes on a modern and IT basis in all fields including metal, power and coal industries, railway transport, textile and food industries, stock-breeding, fruit farming and fish breeding. This reality clearly testifies to the strong desire of the Korean people to put the nation's overall economy on a new higher stage on the basis of the cutting-edge science and technology, concludes the article.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Exercises Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Exercises Opposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea gathered in Phochon City, Kyonggi Province on Mar. 12 to conduct the struggle against the DPRK-targeted war exercises of the United States and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces.
					 They charged that the U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet marine corps launched in the city the street warfare drill as part of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises. 
					
					 Noting that the DPRK-targeted street warfare and live firing drills have been staged in the U.S. forces training ground there during every joint military rehearsal, they demanded an immediate stop to the exercises.
					
					 They called on all the people to turn out in the struggle for peace against war.

articles.title: KFA Italian Branch Assails Joint War Exercises
articles.content:
KFA Italian Branch Assails Joint War Exercises 
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on March 11 denouncing the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers.
					 The saber-rattling involving huge armed forces are provocative exercises for a war of aggression seriously threatening peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, the statement held, adding:
					
					 The exercises clearly show who truly wishes for global peace and stability and who seeks a war.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the joint military exercises going against the trend of the times if they truly stand for global peace and stability.
					
					It statement stressed that the Italian progressive forces and personages and all the people desirous of peace would positively support the Korean people in their cause of peace on the Korean Peninsula and struggle against the U.S. and other imperialists' policy of aggression.

articles.title: DPRK Book and Photo Exhibition Opens in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK Book and Photo Exhibition Opens in Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book and photo exhibition was opened at the State Museum of Guinea on March 10 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Put on display in the exhibition hall were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the revolutionary careers and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the exhibition offers the Guinean people a good opportunity to deeply grasp the brilliant revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung who performed undying feats in accomplishing the human cause of independence and the outstanding idea of Kim Jong Il and his Songun revolutionary leadership exploits.
					
					 The Guinean people will come to know better about the heroic stamina of the Korean people working hard with firm determination to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in 2012 without fail, he stressed.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang parlamentarios de Corea y Camboya
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang parlamentarios de Corea y Camboya
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 17 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre la delegacion del grupo parlamentario de amistad Corea-Camboya y la del mismo grupo Camboya-Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron los integrantes de ambas delegaciones encabezadas respectivamente por el diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Song Ja Rip, quien es presidente de dicho grupo, y por su homologo camboyano Som Chen.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron en la ocasion las opiniones acerca del desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los parlamentos de los dos paises y de otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Extranjeros se convencen de futuro radiante de musica y arte de Corea
articles.content:
Extranjeros se convencen de futuro radiante de musica y arte de Corea
  Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los miembros de la delegacion del Conservatorio Estatal Chaikovski de Moscu de Rusia, de visita en Corea, vieron el dia 15 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la opera "Evgueni Oneguin" y se entrevistaron con el reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea.
					 En la ocasion ellos no contuvieron su emocion de haber visto la funcion que manifesto un aspecto del arte Juche que se desarrolla bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 El jefe de la delegacion y rector Alexandr Sokolov dijo que esta opera tiene estrechas relaciones con su conservatorio y prosiguio que no sabe que decir sobre su sentimiento de ver esta opera restaurada por el Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang.
					
					  Subrayo que gracias a la direccion minuciosa del Dirigente fue posible recrearse magnificamente esta opera.
					
					 Destaco que en el futuro tambien, ellos contribuiran al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre Rusia y Corea al fortalecer el intercambio y la cooperacion entre los dos conservatorios.
					
					 Viendo la opera senti que son muy altos el nivel de educacion del conservatorio coreano y el talento artistico de los estudiantes, senalo el miembro de la delegacion y decano de la facultad de la musica vocal Pyotor Sukusunichenco.
					
					 Otro miembro y decano de la facultad de la direccion Stanislav Kalinin apunto que es dificil tocar las melodias de la opera rusa, pero, los ejecutantes de la orquesta de este conservatorio las ejecutaron en el alto nivel y senalo que a traves de la funcion se convence del futuro radiante de la musica y arte de Corea.

articles.title: Pueblo coreano castigara implacablemente a los agresores
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano castigara implacablemente a los agresores
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ATCC) -- Ahora, los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos desarrollan de manera frenetica los simulacros militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					Se torna muy tirante la situacion del pais debido a esos aventureros ejercicios que preceden a la agresion y resultan el ensayo de guerra nuclear con miras a atacar sorpresiva y preventivamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Frente a ello, todos los militares y civiles de la RPDC redoblan su voluntad de castigar sin piedad a los agresores.
					
					  Los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, que cumplen la vigilancia del frente, el mar y el cielo, defienden fidedignamente las trincheras de la patria para frustrar de un solo golpe cualquier maniobra provocativa de los agresores.
					
					Mientras tanto,  las unidades terrestres, maritimas y aereas del EPC estan en la perfecta disposicion combativa esperando la orden.
					
					  Igualmente, todas las fuerzas milicianas como la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina y la Guardia Juvenil Roja se mantienen en el maximo estado de alerta  para exterminar despiadadamente a los provocadores si estos invaden, aunque fuera 0.001 mm, el cielo, la tierra y el mar sagrados de la RPDC.
					
					  Consultado por la ATCC, el estudiante de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Won Ho, dijo que el gran espiritu de defensa de la patria, que tenian los soldados heroes de origen estudiantil durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), sigue siendo vigente en los estudiantes jovenes de la epoca del Songun.
					
					  Y enfatizo que si pese a nuestras advertencias reiteradas, los imperialistas yanquis y los belicistas surcoreanos traen por fin el nubarron de guerra nuclear al territorio patrio, los estudiantes ofrendaran su vida a la batalla de defensa de la patria tomando en la mano el fusil en reemplazo de la pluma, como lo hicieron sus antecesores de la decada de 1950.
					
					  Hoy dia, todo el pueblo coreano, que se arde de enemistad a los agresores, levanta una gran oleada de auge en la ofensiva general para construir una gran potencia prospera socialista empunando el fusil en una mano, la hoz y el martillo en la otra.

articles.title: ATCC critica a culpables del fracaso de proceso de paz y desnuclearizacion
articles.content:
ATCC critica a culpables del fracaso de proceso de paz y desnuclearizacion
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que debido a los imprudentes alborotos de guerra nuclear de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea, cayo otra vez en la ruptura el proceso de la paz y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publico el dia 16 un memorandum para revelar y condenar la amenaza de guerra nuclear y la politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de EE.UU. y las imprudentes maniobras de las satelites autoridades surcoreanas.
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", que desarrollan ahora EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, son el ensayo de guerra nuclear para agredir a la RPDC y el climax de la amenaza nuclear y significan la negacion total a la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea insisten en que no hay nada que cuestionar en los "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" porque no pasan de ser el "entrenamiento anual y defensivo" sin ningun caracter ofensivo.
					
					Este sofisma es igual a decir que el bandidaje resultara justo si se comete todos los anos.
					
					Los ejercicios en cuestion son la version moderna del entrenamiento militar conjunto "Team Spirit" registrado en la historia como la guerra nuclear experimental para provocar la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					No se puede negar por nada el caracter agresivo de esos ejercicios encaminados al ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					Es tan absurdo discutir la renuncia del disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa con las fuerzas hostiles que hablan del dialogo por una parte y por la otra, andan ansiosos por atacar sorpresivamente a la RPDC con armas nucleares.
					
					La brutal amenaza y la guerra nuclear de ensayo de EE.UU. contra la RPDC parten de la rancia politica del primero para atropellar a la segunda.
					
					Historicamente, EE.UU. no quiso resolver los problemas con la RPDC respetando su soberania sino persiguio unicamente aplastar el regimen de ella.
					
					La administracion Bush fue la que se esforzo mas por ejecutar tal politica hostil a la RPDC detras de la cortina de desnuclearizacion.
					
					Hace un ano, cuando la RPDC lanzo el satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No.2", EE.UU. abogo por sancionarla a escala internacional formando la griteria de que lo lanzado fue un misil. Este hecho hizo saber que la actual administracion norteamericana no desea tampoco que le vayan bien las cosas a la RPDC y es igual a su antecesor ejecutivo en cuanto a la politica hostil a esta
					
					Al librar el ensayo de guerra nuclear por el estilo de los "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", EE.UU. agrando al maximo la amenaza nuclear a la RPDC y endurece la sancion economica mirando con celos las actividades del Grupo de Inversion Internacional Taepung de Corea y del Banco Nacional para el Desarrollo.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no desista de su siniestra intencion de exterminar el regimen y la causa de la RPDC dilatando el tiempo detras de la cortina de desnuclearizacion, no se lograra ningun alcance en el proceso de desnuclearizacion.
					
					La responsabilidad del fracaso del proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta tambien en el imprudente servilismo de las autoridades surcoreanas a EE.UU. y sus maniobras en pro de la confrontacion entre los regimenes del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Al ofrecerse como lacayos en el cumplimiento de la politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, ellas vinieron estropeando y obstaculizando la solucion del problema nuclear gritando la "renuncia nuclear, primero".
					
					Aun despues de que la RPDC tomara con iniciativa unas medidas magnanimas y comprensivas para mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, los titeres surcoreanos ponen la "renuncia nuclear, primero" como condicion de la mejora de las relaciones N-S impidiendo asi la solucion del problema nuclear RPDC-EE.UU. y agravando la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Inmediatamente despues de la toma del poder, esos traidores formalizaron el "regimen democratico liberal" como el "principio y el rumbo de reunificacion" y tratan de lograr en ese "principio" el "derrumbe" del regimen de la RPDC y la "reunificacion a traves de la fusion de regimenes" detras de la cortina de "renuncia nuclear, primero" confabulandose con EE.UU.
					
					Mientras que las autoridades surcoreanas estropeen la desnuclearizacion y libren la antinacional campana de la guerra nuclear abrigando la ambicion tan irrisoria como la "reunificacion a traves de la fusion de regimenes", nunca se mejoraran las relaciones intercoreanas ni se dara el ambiente favorable a la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					No se puede esperar ninguna solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana evadiendo el asunto mas fundamental: la guerra o la paz.
					
					EE.UU. debe eliminar el estado de guerra, causa politico-militar del problema nuclear y la amenaza nuclear, y las relaciones hostiles con la RPDC y tomar las medidas sustanciales para construir la confianza reciproca.
